titles.title: Small Savers Retirement Enhancement Act of 1998
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limits on the amount of nondeductible contributions to individual retirement plans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/12/1998--Introduced. Small Savers Retirement Enhancement Act of 1998 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase specified individual retirement account contribution limits from $2,000 to $5,000.
